data.comment: The match is underway in Beveren.
Maarten Vandevoordt (Genk) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 32, At Freethielstadion, Aleksandar Vukotic has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Patrik Hrosovsky for Genk has been booked by Wim Smet and receives a first yellow card.
The first-half is over at Freethielstadion.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Jess Thorup is making the team's first substitution at Freethielstadion with Cyriel Dessers replacing Kristian Thorstvedt.
Andreas Wiegel is booked for the home team.
In the minute 67, Paul Onuachu scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Luca Oyen to set up the goal.
Genk's Junya Ito has been booked in Beveren.
In the minute 73, Nicky Hayen (Waasland-Beveren) is making a first substitution, with Joe Efford replacing Georges Mandjeck.
Alessandro Albanese (Waasland-Beveren) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team have replaced Luca Oyen with Daniel Munoz. This is the second substitution made today by Jess Thorup.
In the minute 87, Aboubakary Koita is replacing Alessandro Albanese for Waasland-Beveren at Freethielstadion.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Aleksandar Vukotic.
